# The `MinidumpFile` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

A class providing access to the contents of a minidump file.

Definition at line 24 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/minidump-h">Minidump.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### getExceptionStream() {#a2f2d260d8171013121787f6fa0c985f3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; const minidump::ExceptionStream &amp; &gt; llvm::object::MinidumpFile::getExceptionStream (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/minidump/directory">minidump::Directory</a> Directory) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns the contents of the Exception stream.

An error is returned if the associated stream is smaller than the size of the ExceptionStream structure. Or the directory supplied is not of kind exception stream.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/minidump-h/#l00090">90</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/minidump-h">Minidump.h</a>.

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; const minidump::ExceptionStream &amp; &gt; llvm::object::MinidumpFile::getExceptionStream () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns the first exception stream in the file.

An error is returned if the associated stream is smaller than the size of the ExceptionStream structure. Or the directory supplied is not of kind exception stream.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/minidump-h/#l00101">101</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/minidump-h">Minidump.h</a>.

### getExceptionStreams() {#a94c26205368ee8bf686e666dc15a3837}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>iterator&#95;range&lt; llvm::object::MinidumpFile::ExceptionStreamsIterator &gt; MinidumpFile::getExceptionStreams () const</>}>
Returns an iterator that reads each exception stream independently.

The contents of the exception strema are not validated before being read, an error will be returned if the stream is not large enough to contain an exception stream, or if the stream points beyond the end of the file.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/minidump-h/#l00268">268</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/minidump-h">Minidump.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/minidump-cpp/#l00056">56</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/minidump-cpp">Minidump.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getMemory64List() {#ad79b94d312ad221c9d2b49357633a223}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>iterator&#95;range&lt; MinidumpFile::FallibleMemory64Iterator &gt; MinidumpFile::getMemory64List (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> &amp; Err) const</>}>
Returns an iterator that pairs each descriptor with it&#39;s respective content from the Memory64List stream.

An error is returned if the file does not contain a Memory64List stream, or if the descriptor data is unreadable.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/minidump-h/#l00274">274</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/minidump-h">Minidump.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/minidump-cpp/#l00147">147</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/minidump-cpp">Minidump.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getMemoryInfoList() {#a0999878cf807ab0c674f1d3eadcc3ecb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; iterator&#95;range&lt; MinidumpFile::MemoryInfoIterator &gt; &gt; MinidumpFile::getMemoryInfoList () const</>}>
Returns the list of descriptors embedded in the MemoryInfoList stream.

The descriptors provide properties (e.g. permissions) of interesting regions of memory at the time the minidump was taken. An error is returned if the file does not contain this stream, or if the stream is not large enough to contain the number of memory descriptors declared in the stream header. The consistency of the MemoryInfoList entries themselves is not checked in any way.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/minidump-h/#l00283">283</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/minidump-h">Minidump.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/minidump-cpp/#l00062">62</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/minidump-cpp">Minidump.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getMemoryList() {#abb0afb22f7ce895a7c0478a96fb72abf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; ArrayRef&lt; minidump::MemoryDescriptor &gt; &gt; llvm::object::MinidumpFile::getMemoryList () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns the list of descriptors embedded in the MemoryList stream.

The descriptors provide the content of interesting regions of memory at the time the minidump was taken. An error is returned if the file does not contain this stream, or if the stream is not large enough to contain the number of memory descriptors declared in the stream header. The consistency of the MemoryDescriptor entries themselves is not checked in any way.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/minidump-h/#l00115">115</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/minidump-h">Minidump.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns the header to the memory 64 list stream.

An error is returned if the file does not contain this stream.

An error is returned if the file does not contain this stream, or if the stream is not large enough to contain the number of modules declared in the stream header. The consistency of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> entries themselves is not checked in any way.

Returns the contents of the SystemInfo stream, cast to the appropriate type.
